      • getValue

        public <V> V getValue(java.lang.String propertyKey,
                      java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,V> valueConverter)
        Returns the value of resource property.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of value
        Parameters:
        propertyKey - the key of resource property
        valueConverter - function to convert string to return value
        Returns:
        the value of resource property
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if propertyKey or valueConverter is null
        java.util.MissingResourceException - if the property dose not found
        Since:
        1.8.6

      • getValue

        public <V> V getValue(java.lang.String propertyKey,
                      java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,V> valueConverter,
                      V defaultValue)
        Returns the value of resource property.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of value
        Parameters:
        propertyKey - the key of resource property
        valueConverter - the function to convert string to return type
        defaultValue - the default value
        Returns:
        the value of resource property (or defaultValue if not found in properties file)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if propertyKey or valueConverter is null
        Since:
        1.8.6

        Throws:

        Since:

      • getList

        public <E> java.util.List<E> getList(java.lang.String propertyKey,
                                     java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,E> valueConverter)
        Returns a list created from the resource property value if it is found, an empty list otherwise.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the type of elements of the list
        Parameters:
        propertyKey - the key of resource property
        valueConverter - the function to convert string to element type
        Returns:
        a created list (or an empty list)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if propertyKey or valueConverter is null
        Since:
        1.8.6

      • getStringList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getStringList(java.lang.String propertyKey)
        Returns a string list created from the resource property value if it is found, an empty list otherwise.
        Parameters:
        propertyKey - the key of resource property
        Returns:
        a created string list (or an empty list)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if propertyKey is null
        Since:
        1.8.6

      • getMap

        public <K,V> java.util.Map<K,V> getMap(java.lang.String propertyKey,
                                       java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,K> keyConverter,
                                       java.util.function.Function<java.lang.String,V> valueConverter)
        Returns a map created from the resource property value if it is found, an empty map otherwise.
        Type Parameters:
        K - the type of keys of map
        V - the type of values of the map
        Parameters:
        propertyKey - the key of resource property
        keyConverter - the function that converts string to the key type of the map
        valueConverter - the function that converts string to the value type of the map
        Returns:
        a created map (or an empty map)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if propertyKey, keyConverter or valueConverter is null
        Since:
        1.8.6

      • getIntegerKeyMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> getIntegerKeyMap(java.lang.String propertyKey)
        Returns a map (key: Integer, value: String) created from the resource property value if it is found, an empty map otherwise.
        Parameters:
        propertyKey - the key of resource property
        Returns:
        a created map (or an empty map)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if propertyKey is null
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the value can not convert to int
        Since:
        1.8.6
